reviewtext: I guess the universe sensed how much I really wanted a 300mm lens.  I would always search for sales and just dreamed.  But how can I afford one of these lenses? Then one day, this guy popped up for $100.00... Canon yet!  Sure it was "Used" but for $100.00, it was worth a try.  This was more within my budget and I am very, very happy and grateful!
summary: I really wanted a 300mm but couldn't afford one.
